edu.brown.cs.ivy.file

Class IvyElapsedTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.brown.cs.ivy.file.IvyElapsedTime

  • public class IvyElapsedTime
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility implementation helps compensate a sun oversight. Given Calendar or Date ranges or elapsed milliseconds (Long ) this can calculate elapsed days, hours, minutes, and seconds. It can even print them out in a nice format. It converts eplased milliseconds into days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
